name: Keep On Dying
description:
**Might take while to load**

CONTROLS:

WSAD - Movement

LMB - Shooting

Team Name: 3DDJ

Team Members: @damoch @dominikm @JotKa @vahaal @czkawka

Source code: https://github.com/damoch/hom-jam

Assets used: A* Pathfinding Project for Unity - http://arongranberg.com/astar/ (big thanks!)

Go above 100HP - you will die.

Go bellow 0HP - you will die.

You will die. So keep on dying.

====================================================

What we have made is basically a proof of concept. We've been little on time and experience, but still had a great time.

So congratulation to all participants, and all Home of Nerds folks for hosting this awesome event!
